DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomized clinical trial was to examine the widespread effects of thoracic spine thrust manipulation and thoracic non-thrust mobilization on pressure pain sensitivity and neck pain intensity in patients with chronic mechanical neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Manipulation and Mobilization for Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: mechanical idiopathic neck pain bilateral pain symptoms chronic pain (>3 months of duration) whiplash injury previous spine surgery diagnosis of cervical radiculopathy or myelopathy diagnosis of fibromyalgia having undergone any physical therapy intervention in the previous year pregnancy
